mapper.select: SELECT c.id,c.telephone,c.name,c.real_name,c.sex,c.email,c.create_date,c.head_url,c.birthday, c.address,c.interesting,p.pro_id,p.pro_name,p.pro_descript,p.pid,c.company,c.error_count, r.role_id,r.role_name,r.role_descript FROM TB_SYS_CUSTOMER c LEFT JOIN TB_SYS_PROFESSION p ON c.profession_Id = p.pro_id LEFT JOIN TB_SYS_ROLE r ON c.role_id = r.role_id WHERE c.telephone = #{telephone} AND c.password = #{password}
